channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Report Says Illegal Aliens Responsible for Up to 75% of Violent Crime Arrests in Midtown Manhattan

item.title: Joe Biden preps to sell the economy — to boost his legacy and help Harris
item.description: Biden is determined to convince a skeptical public that he strengthened the economy.

item.title: Craigslist Founder Pledges $100 Million to Boost U.S. Cybersecurity
item.description: Donation brings Craig Newmark’s charitable commitments to around $400 million.

item.title: Election 2024 live updates: Harris to address Congressional Hispanic Caucus; Trump to hold Long Island rally
item.description: Get the latest news from the 2024 campaign trail in the contest between Vice President Kamala Harris and former president Donald Trump.

item.title: DHS Inspector General Releases Report on CBP One App, Highlights Mismanagement

item.title: Vance’s media strategy takes a turn
item.description: He was Trump’s policy whisperer to key voting blocs. Now, he’s fueling rumors that Haitian immigrants in Ohio are eating cats and dogs.

item.title: Amazon's Return-to-Office Plans Spark Concern and Debate Among Employees
item.description: Corporate staffers grumbled after the e-commerce giant told workers to be in the office full time starting next year.

item.title: Analysis: Swift’s endorsement of Harris spotlights young voters. They are not a monolith.

item.description: Sweden was once a poster child for open-borders advocates, and regularly made headlines for the social problems associated with those policies. Howeve...

item.title: Weed, wages and same-sex marriage: The most intriguing ballot measures that voters will decide in November
item.description: Across the U.S. in November, voters will weigh proposals on election policies, minimum wage increases and marijuana legalization.

item.title: Meta Bans Russia's RT From Facebook, Instagram for 'Foreign Interference'
item.description: The ban follows U.S. sanctions against the media outlet for alleged attempts to interfere in foreign elections.

item.title: Instagram Is Restricting Teen Accounts---and Blocking Sneaky Workarounds

item.title: Trump says he would name Elon Musk head of government efficiency commission

item.description: Company will make manufacturing operations an independent subsidiary and pause construction on plants in Europe and Asia.

item.title: No, violent crime isn’t soaring, but neither is it falling
item.description: Trump cherry-picks data to argue there’s a crime spree, but violent crime rates are flat over the past ten years
